item.title: Plini
item.description: One of the hidden gems in the music industry, Plini is however, well known among his circle of musicians. Plini is a progressive rock, instrumental guitarist from Sydney, Australia. His style of music is progressive with ambience in it. Essentially a solo artist, Plini has, however collborated with a number of word class musicians such as Marco Minnemann, When asked about his influence, he cited Jimi Hendrix as one of them.
